meanings.definition: Thee: archaic second person singular pronoun, used as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent2: Can I help thee with anything?
meanings.sent3: Thee looks lost in this big city.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd, thee shines like a star.
meanings.sent5: Remember, thee is always welcome here.

meanings.definition: Thee: archaic second person singular pronoun, used as the object of a verb or preposition.
meanings.sent1: She gave thee a gift yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Thee should take care of thyself.
meanings.sent3: Thee seems to have a sweet tooth for chocolate.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of friendship, thee is a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: Thee and I will always be friends.
